item.title: About me
item.author: paolo.enrico@gmail.com (home)
item.description:
Professional Summary

My name is Paolo Fullone. I am a backend software engineer with a strong focus on C# and .NET technologies. I’ve been working in software engineering since September 2022. Working on a distributed systems environment and in C# and .NET, microservices architecture, RESTful APIs, API Gateways, MVC and cloud-based systems applying clean code and SOLID principles.

I have a passion for building scalable and efficient microservices architectures, RESTful APIs, and cloud-based systems. My experience includes working with various databases, messaging systems, and performance optimization techniques. I am committed to writing clean, maintainable code and following best practices in software development.
